data.title: Accused of child sexual abuse
data.meta_description:
Woody Allen is a prominent director and writer, who created films like Annie Hall, Manhattan, Midnight in Paris and The Mighty Aphrodite.

In 1993, Allen's 7-year-old adopted daughter Dylan alleged that he molested her.  Allen denied and continues to deny the allegations, saying that they were part of his ex-partner Mia Farrow's campaign against him for marrying her young daughter, Soon-Yi Previn.
